results.definition: serving as or indicating the object of a verb or of certain prepositions and used for certain other purposes
undistorted by emotion or personal bias; based on observable phenomena
the goal intended to be attained (and which is believed to be attainable)
the lens or system of lenses in a telescope or microscope that is nearest the object being viewed
belonging to immediate experience of actual things or events
examples: there is no objective evidence of anything of the kind

results.definition: emphasizing or expressing things as perceived without distortion of personal feelings or interpretation
